name: Abyss Alpha
description:
Game Mode: Splitscreen

Control Type: Controllers

Abyss is a vertical slice of a third-person co-op platforming game set in a cosmic horror environment developed using the Unreal Engine. The game is part of graduate thesis work conducted at the University of Wisconsin - Stout focusing on pro-social game design. Abyss was developed with the assistance of various technical advisors, concept artists, and an audio team from Berklee School of Music.

https://abyssalpha.squarespace.com/
